name: after (itch) (mary tallontire)
description:
A small interactive virtual world of a post apocalyptic future where climate change has destroyed our current civilization. 

Project created for the 2021 Digital Arts Computing BSc degree show 'Third.'

To see the code for this please go to: https://github.com/matallon/projectOnline 

or alternatively download the assets for your own project here: https://matallon.itch.io/pixel-art-asset-pack-outside-objects
